title: Strengthening Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies Using Open Educational Resources and Open Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Customized educational design for small learner groups with geographical constraints and limited technology access

learning_goals: Learners can select at least three applicable materials by exploring and analyzing mathematics education content from OER platforms for workplace problem-solving
Learners can propose at least two real-life-based mathematical problem-solving procedures applying Open Learning Design (OLD) principles in VR simulation environments
Learners can collaboratively design and share OER-based mathematics learning modules at least once using smartphone-based tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
